name: SuperHero Dress Up Create A Character Games
name_original: SuperHero Dress Up Create A Character Games
description:
Hey Girl! Are you ready to dress up the hottest Superhero?! Me too!

Now you can design your own 'Comics Fashions' like never before! This is the BEST dress up game in the app store!

It's like your own Superhero Salon where you can create the styles that make the other girls jealous!

Choose from all kinds of shirts, dresses, skirts, boots, and bags! Then you can even dazzle things up with jewelry! It's a total fashion makeover!

Download SuperHero Dress Up right now and start dressing your models!

Please Note:
The game can be played for free, but it does have purchases available for real money. If you do not want to use these features, please deactivate in-app purchases.
